short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract vocabulary, text, and definitions straight to Google Sheets to study anything as flashcards while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flashcard Lab easily copies vocabulary, text and definitions from websites into Google Sheets™ in order to make flashcards as you are browsing the web. It also automatically grabs the definition for you from dictionary.com, all for free!

🎉NEW: Now you can review the flashcards with various study modes directly in the Chrome Extension! Unlimited review requires PREMIUM functionality.

📌How To Use:
First, create a new Google Sheets™ spreadsheet (or select an existing one) from the Flashcard Lab Extension options page. Select any text from a webpage, right click and click "Save to spreadsheet". That's it!

🧪Core Features: 
    ✔️Auto-insert words from webpages to Google Sheets™ with one click
    ✔️The extension will find the definition for you from Dictionary.com
    ✔️Free and add unlimited words, text, and definitions!
    ✔️Randomized review of flashcards
    ✔️Study with spaced repetition mode
    ✔️Reverse (answer/prompt) study mode
    ✔️English pronunciation
    ✔️Add synonyms, mnemonics, and more!


🎁More apps in the Flashcard Lab app suite:
Google Sheets™ add-on: https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/flashcard_lab/934660656831

Free iOS app: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/flashcard-lab/id6469375646

Free Android mobile app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tidisventures.flashcardlabmobile


🔒Permissions:
We understand there may be questions regarding the permissions needed to use the extension. We aim to be as transparent as possible hoping to inform you that we have absolutely no intent of using the access you grant to your browser maliciously. Follow the link below to read on:

https://flashcardlab.co/privacy-policy?policy=flashcard-lab


📘 Change log:
